column1: nelya is a Quenya adjective which means "third".  Its plural form is nelyë.

column2: it describes one of the Nelyar—those original Elves that later became the Teleri after they began the Great March.

column1: * http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf/qlist.htm Quenya Corpus Wordlist compiled by Helge Fauskanger
